title: The Super Sage: The Adventures of Charlie Cox
summary: Over one week, 76-year-old Charlie Cox, an avid adviser and coach, mysteriously gains superpowers, helping his community and learning about his new abilities.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche hinweg gewinnt der 76-jährige Charlie Cox, ein begeisterter Berater und Trainer, auf mysteriöse Weise Superkräfte, hilft seiner Gemeinde und lernt über seine neuen Fähigkeiten.
summaryDutch: Gedurende één week krijgt de 76-jarige Charlie Cox, een fervent adviseur en coach, op mysterieuze wijze superkrachten, helpt hij zijn gemeenschap en leert hij over zijn nieuwe vaardigheden.
summaryFrench: Pendant une semaine, Charlie Cox, 76 ans, conseiller et coach passionné, acquiert mystérieusement des superpouvoirs, aide sa communauté et apprend à connaître ses nouvelles capacités.

story.text: Charlie finds an ancient artifact while gardening that grants him the power to read minds. He is baffled but intrigued.
He playfully tests his powers by helping neighbors resolve hidden conflicts during a community meeting, feeling surprisingly youthful.
Charlie's powers deepen; he can now also see brief glimpses of the future. He prevents a small accident at the local park, saving a child.
With rumors spreading, Charlie grows cautious. He spends the day coaching a young basketball team, keeping his powers under wraps.
Charlie's heroism becomes more needed as a storm threatens the town. He uses his foresight to organize effective evacuations.
Feeling the toll of his age and abilities, Charlie mentors a young girl about leadership, hinting at passing on his knowledge and power.
Charlie decides to establish a secret society of heroes, continuing to advise and protect his community quietly.

ending: As the sun set, Charlie Cox smiled, ready for whatever came next, his garden ever so radiant.
moral: Even in our later years, we can discover new roles and impact the world in unexpected ways.
